Title: Enacts the "coal to gas plant conversion and redevelopment blueprint act"
Summary: Enacts the "coal to gas plant conversion and redevelopment blueprint act"; requires the development of a blueprint to guide the replacement and redevelopment of New York's coal burning facilities and their sites by 2030.
LawCode: Add §§66-v & 168-a, amd §168, Pub Serv L; add §§1020-nn & 1874, Pub Auth L; amd §19-0301, En Con L
